an10.186:4.1: “I will teach you the principle that leads to increase and that which leads to decrease. …
an10.186:4.3: And what is the principle that leads to increase?
an10.186:4.6: This is called the principle that leads to increase.
an10.186:5.1: And what is the principle that leads to decrease?
an10.186:5.4: This is called the principle that leads to decrease.”
